question:
####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
How long does the strength boost on Berserker last?
answer:
Like with typical strength boosts from icebreakers, Berserker resets at the end of each encounter.

If the Runner encounters a [Galahad](/en/card/06011), how much strength does Berserker gain?
